vinted-securite-photo-guide.title: Vinted: The ultimate guide to securing your photos
vinted-securite-photo-guide.desc: Why and how to clean your images before selling.
vinted-securite-photo-guide.content:
The Invisible Danger of EXIF Tags

When you sell on Vinted, every item photographed in your bedroom can betray your exact location. JPEG files store EXIF tags containing your GPS coordinates accurate within 3 meters.

The 'Send via WhatsApp' Trap

Many sellers send extra photos via private message. Unlike the Vinted platform which compresses slightly, direct sending delivers the raw original file with all your personal data.

The GhostMeta Solution

By processing your photos in GhostMeta before uploading, you neutralize these digital signatures. Our tool rebuilds the image pixel by pixel to ensure no ghost data remains.

supprimer-exif-iphone-android.title: Remove EXIF on iPhone and Android
supprimer-exif-iphone-android.content:
On iPhone (iOS)

Apple now allows hiding location when sharing, but it doesn't remove data from the stored file. For actual purging, use a local processing tool.

On Android

Android systems are particularly verbose. Besides GPS, they store lens serial numbers and capture settings (ISO, speed), creating a real hardware fingerprint.

Why Local Processing?

Using a cloud app to clean photos is like giving your data to a third party so they can hide it from others. GhostMeta cleans in your RAM, without any file transfer.

comprendre-donnees-exif-gps.title: Understanding EXIF and GPS Data
comprendre-donnees-exif-gps.desc: Everything you need to know about hidden metadata.
comprendre-donnees-exif-gps.content:
What is EXIF?

Created in 1995, Exchangeable Image File Format is a standard for attaching metadata to images. What was useful for pro photographers became a privacy nightmare with GPS smartphones.

Most Sensitive Tags

  • GPS Altitude/Latitude: Your precise location.
  • DateTimeOriginal: The exact time revealing your routines.
  • Make/Model: Your equipment value, a potential target for theft.

nettoyage-photo-local-vs-cloud.title: Photo Cleaning: Local vs Cloud
nettoyage-photo-local-vs-cloud.content:
The Cloud Flaw

Free online cleaning sites are often 'data vacuums'. By sending your photo to their servers, you grant them access to the original before cleaning.

Zero-Knowledge Philosophy

GhostMeta uses your browser's Canvas API. This means your CPU does the work and your internet connection is never used to transfer images. It's the only 100% anonymous method.

ghostmeta-manifeste-confidentialite.title: GhostMeta: Privacy Manifesto
ghostmeta-manifeste-confidentialite.content:
Privacy is Not an Option

We created GhostMeta because existing tools were either too complex or too intrusive. Our manifesto is based on free basic service and total code transparency.

Our Commitment

No trackers, no ad cookies, and processing that will forever remain local.
